= Client =

[QDigiDocClient DigiDoc3 client] is a program that allows you to digitally sign documents with an ID card and mobile phone, check the validity of digital signatures and open and save documents located in the envelope of !DigiDoc3 Client.
Documents in the envelope (.bdoc or .ddoc extension file) can be seen by other people and can be saved to your computer.

= Crypto =
Digidoc3 Crypto is a program which allows you to make secret documents (encrypt) and make the secret documents readable by everyone again (decrypt). Files with secret content are with a .cdoc extension.
